```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

plotting functions in ggplot2

```{r}
fx = function(x) {3 * (x ^ 2) + 4}
ggplot(data.frame(x = c(1,100)), aes(x = x)) + geom_function(fun = fx)
```

# Partial Derivative

```{r}
fxyz = expression(2 * x + y +3 * (x ^ 2) * (z ^ 3))
dfdy = D(fxyz, 'y')
dfdy
```
